definition[0]: when something separates or is separate
example[0]: the separation of church and state
example[1]: the zone of separation between the warring factions
definition[1]: a period of time that two or more people spend apart from each other
example[2]: the separation of families during wartime
definition[2]: a situation in which a husband and wife agree to live apart even though they are still married
